We have a saying here at Reviewed—there's no such thing as a good deal on a bad product. But how can you tell a good product from a dud? Well, let us help you there: We spend most of our time testing products to figure out the best from the rest. During big sale days, like Black Friday, Cyber Monday, and Amazon Prime Day, you can find our experts digging through major retailers like Walmart, Target, and Best Buy to find deals on products we know are fantastic. And these five products—all on sale at Amazon for just a few more hours—are each the top of their class. 

The absolute best products you can buy at Amazon's Cyber Monday sale

  • The Best TV:  LG OLED C1 Series 55-Inch Alexa Voice Remote Control Built-In 4k Smart TV at Amazon for $1,296.99 (Save $203)
  • The Best VR Headset: Oculus Quest 2 at Amazon for $299 (Get a $50 Amazon credit with code OCULUS50) 
  • The Best Rice Cooker:  Zojirushi Neuro Fuzzy Rice Cooker 5.5-Cup at Amazon for $178.98 (Save $77.02)
  • The Best Robot Vacuum:  iRobot Roomba j7+ (7550) Self-Emptying Robot Vacuum at Amazon for $649 (Save $200.99)
  • The Best Air Fryer:  Philips Premium Airfryer XXL at Amazon for $199.95 (Save $150)

All five of those items have bested their competitors in our scientific tests, and we stand behind all of them. Want to know more? Check out our full reviews on the best TVs, written by our television experts, the best VR headsets, written by an expert in the gaming field, the best rice cookers as tested by our kitchen & cooking team, the best robot vacuums (these vacuums had to pass our robot vacuum obstacle course to get this crown!), and the best air fryers as decided by our expert cooks.

These products are worth your money, even when they're at retail price. But getting them on sale? That's a bargain you can feel good about.
